TEXT.S:
(kamu nu hulam:) patideng/patizeng patizeng tu malebekay a paza' ci Tuku. Tuku
tizeng tizeng amanakasa i panan.
patizeng patizeng tu malebekay a paza' ci Tuku. Tuku
pitizeng makaazih tu tayniay a tademaw pitizeng mimetmet tu lima! !
mapatizeng mapatizeng tu ku luma' nu misu Panay. Panay
mutizeng ayaw nu saupu mutizeng ku katuuday.
tizenga tizenga kisu a papelu i nuayawan nu katuuday.
nipatizeng kiya hizaen ku nipatizeng tu tektek? ?
nipatizengan u nipatizengan nu maku a luma' kuyni.
nitizeng matihuway ku nitizeng ni Batu. Batu
